name: Markdown Code Block
content: Inline `code` has `back-ticks around` it. Inline `code` has `back ticks around` it `code`. ```javascript var s = "JavaScript syntax highlighting"; alert(s); ``` ```python s = "Python syntax highlighting" print s ``` ``` No language indicated, so no syntax highlighting. But let's throw in a tag. ```
